div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 295px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Thing
Metadata, e.g. name, dimension, location, icon

div.div:
non-networked thing
(abstract thing)
metadata thing,
has only metadata, e.g. position or geofence
no network interface
